chapter.title: DNS Service Installation Overview
chapter.para: The &productname; DNS Service supports several different backends for domain name service. The choice of backend must be included in the deployment model before the &productname; install is completed.

warning.para: By default any user in the project is allowed to manage a DNS domain. This can be changed by updating the Policy.json file for Designate.

chapter.para: The backends that are available within the DNS Service are separated into two categories, self-contained and external.

row.entry: All components necessary will be installed and configured as part of the &productname; install.
POCs and customers who wish to keep cloud and traditional DNS separated.
The authoritative DNS server itself is external to &productname;. Management and configuration is out of scope for the &clm; but remains the responsibility of the customer.
Customers who wish to integrate with their existing DNS infrastructure.
